summary:
Some patches for mods:
-Unofficial Skyrim Patch
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13241]Battle fatigue and injuries[/url] by kuertee
descriptionHtml:
[color=green]//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
// WHAT IT DOES
//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[/color]
1)Unofficial Skyrim Patch
-Reverts alchemy enchantment to restoration school again in order to use snow ball exploit. "Unofficial Skyrim Patch Enchantment Alchemy Restoration".

2) [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13241]Battle fatigue and injuries[/url] by kuertee ([color=red]VERSION 0.704 HAS FIX THIS ISSUE[/color])
-Fix Player not getting injuries, now you will get injuries. Just replace the included .pex.
-Bugs not fixed in 0.701 (or real 0.702):
*In active effects you will get dual injury one multiple of 5 and other below 5 (I think it is because the creator uses a spell and a spell5) (see pic).
*Your first injury will most likely be an arm injury, even if you set 0% chances with mcm in game.
*Replacing the original pex now adds the player injuries.
*Leg injures 100, hit your movement (in a strange way) but not your jumps, you can go back home jumping .

Also check these:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39686]Sneak Tools Patch[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40036]Deadly Combat Patch[/url]

[color=green]//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
// REQUIREMENTS
//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[/color]
-The original mod that you want to patch.
-And SKSE if there are .pex files involved, [url=http://skse.silverlock.org]here[/url].

[color=green]//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
// INSTALL
//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[/color]
-Replace all the files or use NMM.

[color=green]//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
// UNINSTALL
//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[/color]
-Replace all the original files or use NMM.

[color=green]//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
// EXTRA NOTES
//++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[/color]
-I could upload a full fixed bsa + esp for each patch, but if I do this you won't download the original file and I don't want that way.
author: JvM
